feed.subtitle: Marco Colasso Soca AKA Maar personal blog and world wide web site. WelcomE To mY vintage NeW WorlD. Slow down to enter a place where space-time bends and things can get weird, gravity is 2.94 slower than earth, don't be afraid.

entry.title: Skyl0
entry.content:
Skylight.1

Soundscapes from the north of Maar World, recorded when groundwater comes into contact with magma.

  • Master: I/O Studios by Nicolas Panzl and Diego Rey, Montevideo Uruguay.
  • Artwork: vrglitch + Maar

Download

Thanks for purchasing this composition, hope you enjoy it.

mp3

uncompressed wav

entry.title: Skyl00
entry.content:
Skylight.2

Soundscapes from the East of Maar World. Air creatures singing, landing into the surface of the exoplanet.

  • Master: I/O Studios by Nicolas Panzl and Diego Rey, Montevideo Uruguay.
  • Artwork: vrglitch + Maar

entry.title: Sphe0
entry.content:
Spherical Drops

Timeless and Spaceless mix from planet Earth, remixing Chopin experiences in Valdemosa, frogs singing in Valizas, jungle recordings in Costa Rica.

  • Artwork: Maar

Download

Thanks for purchasing this composition, hope you enjoy it.
